tooltip.industrial_platform.industrial_p:
§aRight Click with empty hands to adjust Types of Platform
§aRightclick while sneaking to choose fill the space or not
§aRightclick with any stone to deploy the platform
tooltip.industrial_platform.fluid_pool: §aRightclick with any stone to deploy the infinite pool
message.industrial_platform.too_low: Too low to deploy an Infinity Pool!
tooltip.jade.industrialplatform.floating: Blocks above the platform will be removed
tooltip.jade.industrialplatform.filling: Blocks above the platform will not be removed
